text: Heinrich Schmidt (10 January 1912 – 16 August 1988) was a German footballer who played for Borussia Neunkirchen, 1. FC Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a defender. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1988 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:Association football defenders Category:Footballers from Saarland Category:Sportspeople from Saarbrücken
title: Heinrich Schmidt (footballer)
